title: Last Stand
body:
Song written by me <3!

Last Stand

That's my last stand, that's what I became
Im fighting until everything I've lost is regain
and never give up, till I've reached my goal.

Let's forget about glory,  wealth and might
and fight for our rights,
I don't deserve more than you,
and you don't deserve less.
we just have to confess, that we are all the same.

That's my last stand, that's what I became
Im fighting until everything I've lost is regain
and never give up, till I've reached my goal.

day after day, night after night
our dream comes closer into our sight
we have to face our inner demons,
and kick out our greed, hate and misery
then we just gonna create a world of Equality.

That's my last stand, that's what I became
Im fighting until everything I've lost is regain
and never give up, till I've reached my goal.

replies.body: Ohne Musik kann ich mir irgendwie nichts darunter vorstellen ^^

Ausreden! Ausreden!
Mikro schnappen, zur Not AutoTune besorgen, lossingen.
Gitarren sind günstig und schnell gelernt. Die Ärzte spielen seit 30 Jahren die selben 4 Takte. *fg*

Man schenkt ja auch niemandem ein Stück Papier und sagt: "Schau mal, ein Origami." :P
